description: Value hypotheses for TypeScript Fullstack Template. Track value delivery through behavior implementation and outcome validation.
mvpObjective: Create production-ready PERN stack monorepo template that enables teams to ship type-safe, tested, scalable applications in hours instead of weeks.

BUILD.MONOREPO.TURBOREPO.VALIDATE.statement: IF we implement Turborepo with optimized caching and pipelines, THEN teams achieve 10x faster build times through intelligent caching and parallel execution

QUALITY.BIOME.ENFORCE.VALIDATE.statement: IF we enforce Biome linting/formatting with zero warnings policy, THEN teams maintain consistent code quality and eliminate entire classes of bugs before they reach production

TEST.VITEST.INTEGRATION.VALIDATE.statement: IF we integrate Vitest with co-located tests and coverage enforcement, THEN teams ship with confidence knowing tests run fast (<100ms) and catch regressions immediately

API.ROUTES.CRUD.VALIDATE.statement: IF we provide sample CRUD API routes with full type safety, THEN developers can scaffold new endpoints in minutes with confidence in type correctness

UI.COMPONENT.LIBRARY.VALIDATE.statement: IF we provide shared UI component library with Tailwind, THEN teams build consistent interfaces 5x faster with reusable, tested components
